title:
Asymptotic behavior of a diffused interface volume-preserving mean
  curvature flow
authors: Matteo Bonforte, Francesco Maggi and Daniel Restrepo
abstract:
We consider a diffused interface version of the volume-preserving mean
curvature flow in the Euclidean space, and prove, in every dimension and under
natural assumptions on the initial datum, exponential convergence towards
single "diffused balls".
